en.title: [2024] Poverty
en.description: Latest data on poverty, covering absolute, relative, and hardcore poverty rates at national, state, and district level.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest data on poverty, covering absolute, relative, and hardcore poverty rates at national, state, and district level.

bm.title: [2024] Kemiskinan
bm.description: Data terkini tentang kemiskinan, merangkumi kadar kemiskinan mutlak, relatif, dan tegar di peringkat nasional, negeri, dan daerah.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data terkini kemiskinan, merangkumi kadar kemiskinan mutlak, relatif, dan tegar di peringkat nasional, negeri, dan daerah.
